articles.title: Coachella 2024: Doja Cat, Tyler the Creator and Lana Del Rey to headline - BBC.com
articles.description: Skepta, Raye, Flo and BBC Sound of 2024 winners The Last Dinner Party are also performing in April.
articles.content:
By Bonnie McLarenBBC Newsbeat
Say so... Doja Cat is one of the top acts at Coachella 2024
Doja Cat, Tyler, the Creator and Lana Del Rey have been announced as headliners at this year's Coachella.
